Description: Fragment of oval handle to sharpish turn of a Rhodian pottery transport amphora. Clay fine buff; pink core; cream slip. Rectangular stamp.
Curator's comments: Ink, deleted, worn number; reading of text. Name Gorgon. From same die as Alexandria, Greco-Roman Museum, MGR 011.09.
Bibliographic references: Stoddart 1847 / Memoir on the inscribed pottery of Rhodes, Cnidus and other Greek Cities (152)
